short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find and activate all your Google Mail™ tabs!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Has this ever happened to you?! You're using Google Mail™ with Google Chrome™ and you switch to another window and... you can't... just can't find your active mail tab anymore! It's lost in a sea of browser windows and tabs!

How unprofessional! How embarrassing!

But wait! This extension provides a simple solution to your "lost mail tab" woes! Just click on its icon and all tabs open to a "mail.googe.com" URL will be activated and focused to the foreground!
